import React from 'react' import logo from './images/logo.svg' import { FaBars } from 'react-icons/fa' import { useGlobalContext } from './context' const Navbar = () => { const { openSidebar, openSubmenu, closeSubmenu } = useGlobalContext() const displaySubmenu = (e) => { const page = e.target.textContext; const tempBtn = e.target.getBoundingClientRect() console.log(tempBtn) openSubmenu() } return (
) } export default Navbar
